title: User Profile Settings Page
technical_notes: Frontend page and form components for profile management. Reuses existing UI primitives (Input, Button, Card, Select). Follow patterns from OrderHistoryList for page layout. React Query hooks for server state.
security_review: PASSED - Frontend only, reads from authenticated API. Email field read-only prevents email modification attempts. No sensitive data handling on client.
approach: Create ProfileForm component with controlled inputs, useProfile hook for data fetching, useUpdateProfile for mutations. AvatarUpload as separate component with file picker integration.

acceptance_criteria_review.notes: Good coverage of loading, error, validation, RTL, accessibility states

ui_notes: Must be RTL (dir='rtl'), Hebrew labels, mobile-first responsive design
